GSD.product_version: versions from v4.12 to before v5.10.140
GSD.description:
md: call __md_stop_writes in md_stop

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.140 by commit a5a58fab556bfe618b4c9719eb85712d78c6cb10, it was introduced in version v4.12 by commit 48df498daf62e1292868005675331929305067f0. For more details please see the references link.
